The gentle but ferocious giant started to get all cheery at that mention.

???: WANT MORE FUN!!!! WANT MORE FUN!!!!

Somehow, though, the guards were quite satisfied with what they saw.

Guard 1 (from behind his door): Okay, you're in... I think there was
some comotion in sector 29. Go introduce yourself to the investigators
there and check if there's something you can do.
